name: Aetherborne
description:
Welcome to the world of airships.

Your task is to protect the city against the airships.
You have different cannons at your disposal for this mission, advance the game to unlock them all.
After a few scouts, the Airships rush to attack the city.

Don't disappoint the city and please dont die!

Controls:
Aim - mouse
Shoot - mouse1

Credits: Janne Sokka, Miikka Rantanen and Antti Hirvikoski

Finnish College Jam #4 project, build in 4 days.
